caption:
This photograph captures a scene in what appears to be an industrial or salvage yard. The primary focus is on a large flatbed trailer loaded with compressed and stacked cars. Each car is crushed into thin, compact layers, displaying various faded colors and exposing twisted metal and components, which give a textured, chaotic feel to the load.

To the right side of the image is a person, dressed in light-colored clothing, possibly a worker, standing beside the trailer. The person is slightly bent over, looking towards the ground or perhaps handling something just below the visible frame.

In the background, there's more evidence of industrial activity. Additional stacked, compressed car parts or scrap metal are visible. A crane and other machinery, likely used for moving and processing the scrap, can be seen in the far background. There is also a tall smokestack emitting a plume of dark smoke, suggesting ongoing industrial processes.

The setting appears to be a bright, sunny day with clear blue skies, which contrasts sharply with the industrial activity and the heap of discarded metal on display. The overall scene underscores themes of recycling, waste management, and the environmental impact of industrial activities.
title: Crushed cars on flatbed truck.  (from the documerica-1 exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 63 64, 65.)
